integration.title: AI Integrations
integration.subtitle: Powered by advanced AI technology
integration.description: Independent Worker integrates with cutting-edge AI models and fashion platforms to provide the most accurate virtual try-on experience.

item-1.title: Advanced Computer Vision
item-1.description: State-of-the-art body detection and pose estimation for accurate fitting.

item-2.title: 3D Body Modeling
item-2.description: Create realistic 3D body models for precise garment visualization.

item-3.title: AI Style Assistant
item-3.description: Get personalized style recommendations based on your preferences.

item-4.title: Real-time Processing
item-4.description: Instant try-on results with our optimized AI inference engine.

item-5.title: Fashion Database
item-5.description: Access millions of clothing items with AI-powered search and matching.

item-6.title: Trend Analysis
item-6.description: AI-powered fashion trend analysis and personalized recommendations.

integration2.title: Seamless AI Fashion Integration
integration2.description: Connect with your favorite fashion retailers and get AI-powered styling recommendations across all platforms.

features.title: AI-Powered Features
features.subtitle: Revolutionary virtual try-on technology
features.description: Experience the future of online shopping with our advanced AI features designed to transform how you discover and try on clothes.

item-1.title: Virtual Try-On Technology
item-1.description: See how any outfit looks on you with our advanced AI that creates realistic virtual fittings using just your photo, eliminating guesswork from online shopping.

item-2.title: Smart Size Recommendations
item-2.description: Get accurate size suggestions powered by AI analysis of your body measurements and fit preferences, reducing returns and ensuring perfect fits every time.

item-3.title: Style Matching AI
item-3.description: Discover clothes that match your personal style with our AI that learns your preferences and suggests outfits tailored to your taste and lifestyle.

item-4.title: Real-time Outfit Combinations
item-4.description: Mix and match different clothing items instantly with AI-powered outfit generation that creates stunning combinations you never thought of.

features2.title: Advanced AI Capabilities
features2.subtitle: Next-generation fashion technology
features2.description: Discover the powerful AI features that make Independent Worker the most advanced virtual try-on platform

features3.title: Core AI Features
features3.subtitle: Cutting-edge technology at your fingertips
features3.description: Explore the advanced AI capabilities that power Independent Worker's virtual try-on experience

item-1.title: Lightning-Fast AI Processing
item-1.description: Get instant try-on results with our optimized AI models that process images in real-time

item-2.title: Advanced Body Recognition
item-2.description: Precise body detection and pose estimation for accurate virtual clothing placement

item-3.title: Smart Style Suggestions
item-3.description: AI-powered recommendations based on your style preferences and body type

item-4.title: Intelligent Fit Analysis
item-4.description: Advanced algorithms that predict how clothes will fit based on your measurements

item-5.title: Realistic Fabric Rendering
item-5.description: See how different fabrics drape and move with our physics-based AI simulation

item-6.title: Trend Prediction AI
item-6.description: Stay ahead of fashion trends with our AI that analyzes global fashion data

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Independent Worker

item-1.question: How accurate is the AI virtual try-on?
item-1.answer: Our AI technology achieves 95% accuracy in virtual fitting by using advanced computer vision and 3D body modeling.

item-2.question: What types of clothing can I try on?
item-2.answer: You can virtually try on shirts, dresses, pants, jackets, shoes, and accessories from our partner retailers.

item-3.question: Is my personal data secure?
item-3.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption and never store your photos longer than necessary for processing.

item-4.question: Can I use Independent Worker on mobile devices?
item-4.answer: Absolutely! Independent Worker works seamlessly on all devices including smartphones, tablets, and desktops.

item-5.question: Need more help?
item-5.answer: Contact our AI fashion experts at support@outfitai.com for personalized assistance.

testimonials.title: What Users Say About Independent Worker
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from fashion enthusiasts

item-1.name: Sarah Johnson
item-1.quote: Independent Worker completely changed how I shop online. The AI try-on is so accurate, I haven't returned a single item!

item-2.name: Michael Chen
item-2.quote: The AI recommendations are spot-on. It's like having a personal stylist that knows exactly what looks good on me.

item-3.name: Emma Rodriguez
item-3.quote: As a designer, I'm amazed by the accuracy of the fabric simulation. Independent Worker is the future of fashion tech.

item-4.name: David Kim
item-4.quote: Our return rates dropped by 60% after integrating Independent Worker. Customers love seeing how clothes actually look on them.

item-5.name: Lisa Wang
item-5.quote: Independent Worker helps me serve more clients by quickly showing them how different outfits will look. It's incredibly efficient.

item-6.name: James Thompson
item-6.quote: The AI technology is remarkable. Our customers are more confident in their purchases and satisfaction has increased dramatically.

item-7.name: Sofia Martinez
item-7.quote: The virtual try-on is so realistic, it feels like magic. Independent Worker has revolutionized how I help clients choose outfits.

item-8.name: Alex Turner
item-8.quote: The 3D rendering quality is exceptional. Independent Worker captures how fabric moves and fits better than anything I've seen.

item-9.name: Rachel Green
item-9.quote: Since using Independent Worker, my online sales have tripled. Customers love being able to try before they buy.

item-10.name: Mark Davis
item-10.quote: The AI is incredibly sophisticated. It considers body type, posture, and even fabric properties. Truly impressive technology.

item-11.name: Anna Kowalski
item-11.quote: Independent Worker helped me understand fit and proportion better than any textbook. It's an invaluable learning tool.

item-12.name: Tony Stark
item-12.quote: Independent Worker is setting the standard for virtual try-on technology. The AI accuracy and speed are unmatched in the industry.
